mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shop_cart WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND goods_id=#{goodsId} ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_cart(user_id, goods_id, goods_sn, goods_name, price, number, checked, pic_url, add_time, update_time) VALUES(#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsSn}, #{goodsName}, #{price}, #{number}, #{checked}, #{picUrl}, #{addTime}, #{updateTime})
